name: Tata Punch EV
description: The price of Tata Punch EV, a Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 10.99  - 15.49 Lakh. It is available in 20 variants. Punch EV comes with 6 airbags. Tata Punch EV has a ground clearance of 190 mm  and is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a driving range of 378.6 Km for Punch EV.
